author: Graham Dyson
description: Analyzes JavaScript on the file system, processes the analysis and renders the processed analysis to an SVG.
name: eunice

scripts.all: npm run spellcheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run dogfooding && npm run harness
scripts.build: npm run build-prepare && npx webpack -p --config webpack.config.js && rm dist/bin.js.map
scripts.build-development: npm run build-prepare && npx webpack -d --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r node_modules/@devsnicket/eunice-renderer-test-harness/dist/harness dist && rm dist/harness/harness.js.map
scripts.dogfooding: (cd dogfooding && rm -rf output && mkdir output && cd .. && node bin --directoryToCreateOrAddToStacksFrom=dogfooding --includeServiceWorkers=true --includeSourceMap=true --ignoreDirectoryNames=.devsnicket-plugin-discovery --ignoreDirectoryNames=.git --ignoreDirectoryNames=.vscode --ignoreDirectoryNames=dist --ignoreDirectoryNames=gh-pages --ignoreDirectoryNames=node_modules --ignoreDirectoryNames=output --ignoreDirectoryNames=test-cases --ignoreDirectoryNames=test-coverage --outputBaseFileName=index --outputDirectoryPath=dogfooding/output --packageNames=call-with-process-standard-streams --packageNames=dependency-and-structure --packageNames=javascript-analyzer --packageNames=processors --packageNames=renderer --packageNames=renderer-test-harness --packageNames=run-tests-from-file-system --packageNames=test-harnesses --packageNames=test-harnesses-processor-plugins --packagePrefix=eunice- --packageScope=devsnicket --directories=. --rootItemIdentifiers=javascript)
scripts.harness: (cd harness && rm -rf output && mkdir output && npx webpack -p --config webpack.config.js)
